Package com.spleefleague.core.listener

Class EnvironmentListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spleefleague.core.listener.EnvironmentListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener
    public class EnvironmentListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Player listener for out of game actions

      Perform effects based on the type of damage a player takes

      Handle certain entity damaging events
      void onEntityDeath​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent event)
      Prevent entities from dropping anything on death
      void onEntityExplode​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityExplodeEvent event)
      Allow creeper and tnt explosions but don't destroy blocks
      void onEntityInteractEntity​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEntityEvent event)
      Handle certain player entity interactions such as interacting with vendors
      void onEntityToggleGlide​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityToggleGlideEvent event)
      Prevent non-creative (maybe do by role?) players from being able to use elytras, for when they become a cosmetic item
      void onGameModeChange​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerGameModeChangeEvent event)
      Prevent gamemode from being changed by other plugins (looking at you MultiVerse)
      void onItemPickup​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityPickupItemEvent event)
      Prevent non-building players from picking up items TODO: **Idea** Add handler to possibly add vendor items to collection on pickup?
      void onMobSpawn​(org.bukkit.event.entity.CreatureSpawnEvent event)
      Prevent mobs from spawning naturally
      void onPlayerDeath​(org.bukkit.event.entity.PlayerDeathEvent event)
      Save location of death for /back usage TODO: Do we really need this?
      void onPlayerFoodChange​(org.bukkit.event.entity.FoodLevelChangeEvent event)
      Prevent player food from dropping
      void onPlayerInteract​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent event)
      Prevent most of world from being interacted with
      void onPlayerItemDamage​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerItemDamageEvent event)
      Prevent player items from taking durability
      void onPlayerMoveSign​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerMoveEvent event)
      Perform some actions if a player walks into or above a sign with specific text on it
      void onPlayerRespawn​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerRespawnEvent event)
      Force player to spawn at a designated spawn location as opposed to world spawn
